extendedInfo.description: "Yet another brilliant slice of freebie fun" -Pocket Gamer"You really need to give Ninjump a try" -Touch Arcade"Check out Ninjump, it's extremely fun" -148 Apps"This is fast becoming one of my favorites" -The App EraRise to the top and become a ninja master in NINJUMP, the latest FREE game from Backflip Studios, makers of PAPER TOSS!In this fast paced ninja climbing game, your goal is to rise as high as you can while avoiding killer squirrels, angry birds, enemy ninjas, throwing stars and exploding bombs. With a simple tap you can jump from one wall to the other, knocking obstacles from the air as you do. Take down three enemies of the same kind to trigger mega-jump bonuses. Collect shields to plow through your opponents with. Just watch out for ledges and other ninjas because they will knock you off and send you to your doom!You will be amazed by the gorgeous graphics, rich gameplay, immersive music and the insanely addictive quality of this game.Features include:-Simple single-tap gameplay-Ninjas-Killer squirrels-More ninjas-Beautiful graphics-Awesome bonuses-Original sound and music-Papaya Leaderboards-Challenge a friend via email-Post scores on Facebook or TwitterAt Backflip Studios making fun games is priority one! We have seen over 34,000,000 downloads across our library of games and greatly value your support and feedback.Try PAPER TOSS our other hit FREE game!Follow us on twitter: @backflipstudiosThanks for playing!

reviews.comment: A really good game for time Fun and relaxing  Love it :-)

reviews.title: Great Game
reviews.comment: For those of you that enjoy a good and relaxing game well this is for you because this game is easy to catch on to and will eventually become addicting the more and more you play so I definetly recomend this game.

reviews.comment: It is nice and fun, but if distance can be converted to credit and buy attire or item, it would be best

reviews.title: Simple but fun
reviews.comment: This game Is very simple but yet is still fun. I got this one for my kids but I think i play it more than my kids do.
reviews.author: Andrew Slayton

reviews.title: Very disappointed
reviews.comment: I had this game before, then I uninstalled it because I needed more space. I decided I wanted it again, so I installed again and now it sucks. I hate where the score is and it takes forever to load. The runner is also slower and it\'s very lame now. Uninstalled!!

reviews.comment: Keeps me engaged in free tym..it is a wonderful game wd very cute bckground sounds and has a good interface grapics.. :)

reviews.title: Great \"quick\" game!
reviews.comment: Fun and simple.  Great for when you only have a couple of minutes to spare.  Latest version runs very smooth on my galaxy s3.  Highly recommend.
reviews.author: Kurt Sunderman

reviews.title: Ninja jump..
reviews.comment: A nice game to play with.. With gud graphics n fast responses.. I\'m enjoyin it..
reviews.author: Kumar Abhishek

reviews.title: Quite Entertaining
reviews.comment: Quite a bit of fun and somewhat addictive. A great way to while away a long bus, train or plane ride, if reading is not your thing. It is not particularly taxing on the brain, but it is fun and I would recommend it to any one.
reviews.author: Seyram Butame
